name: Space Escape (wmjtilbu)
description:
You are a small astronaut in a big ship when all of a sudden the ship is hit by a meteor shower. 

Your goal is to avoid all obstacles and try to reach the escape pod before your oxygen runs out.

Cheats (press following keys):

  • 1 - go to level 1 (in menu)
  • 2 - go to level 2 (in menu)
  • 3 - go to level 3 (in menu)
  • 4 - go to level 4 (in menu)
  • t - add 10 seconds (in levels)
